long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
v0.35:
* added 'category scanner' for new topics functional
----
Extension provide new feature: 'follow by push' in Laracasts discuss.
Extension check in background all threads, whitch you are subscribed for and if finds new updates -- push to you notifications. 

* checks every 30 seconds
* autoremoved subscribeds, when no update 3 days

if you have any troubles, you can create new issue on project github. PR also welcomed
